meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: LUCKY GUY

div.a: The NASA Scientist Who Answers Your 2012 Apocalypse Emails

div.div: David Morrison is the closest thing that NASA has to an expert on the apocalypse.

li.div: this guy rules RT @Awl: Meet NASA's Lone Defense Against Armageddon Loons - theawl.com/2012/09/nasa-ap...

div.div: MEME RESURRECTION

div.a: Giant Techno Viking Head Inflates When You Tweet It

div.div: Every time someone tweets the hashtag #TechnoViking, the meme is resurrected a bit as rigged air pumps inflate him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R46KKx&via=Digg&text=Giant Techno Viking Head Inflates When You Tweet It

div.div: MARRIAGE PROPOSALS FOR JERKS

div.a: Before Proposing To Girlfriend, Man Fakes His Own Death

div.div: A wealthy Russian businessman who wanted to propose to his girlfriend decided to test her love for him before popping the question â€” by faking his own death.

li.div: No red flags here. Can't see how this relationship would have issues later. gawker.com/5940288/before-prop...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UpDM6G&via=Digg&text=Before Proposing To Girlfriend, Man Fakes His Own Death

div.div: NO McRIBS HERE
The fast-food giant reportedly plans to open its first vegetarian-only restaurant next year in India.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qj4XiT&via=Digg&text=McDonald's To Open Vegetarian Restaurant

div.div: OUCH

div.a: Al-Jazeera Gets The Crap Hacked Out Of It

div.div: There are hacks, and then there are hacks. After this morning's apparent Apple UDID dump, Al-Jazeera's English website has been defaced in about the most conspicuous way possible. But who's responsible?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NaRUAl&via=Digg&text=Al-Jazeera Gets The Crap Hacked Out Of It

div.div: PIROUETTING SO YOU DON'T HAVE TO

div.a: Writer Dons Pink Tutu In Response To Demand From Hackers

div.div: Let's hope this won't become a regular demand before sources agree to speak with writers, but it did make for quite the sight as the tech world returned from the long Labor Day weekend.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NboNwI&via=Digg&text=Writer Dons Pink Tutu In Response To Demand From Hackers

div.div: BESPOKE SUITS
There is now a large difference between what is monetizable and what is actually valuable.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/NaYQNV&via=Digg&text=What's A $4,000 Suit Worth?

div.div: BLOW THE GROUNSILS

These 17 synonyms for sex were used often enough in 19th-century England to earn a place in the 1811 Dictionary of the Vulgar Tongue, a book for upper-crust Britons who had no idea what the proles were talking about.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RHyMGP&via=Digg&text=17 Euphemisms For Sex From The 1800s

div.div: INCEPTION

div.a: Researchers Open The Door To 'Dream Engineering'

div.div: Researchers have figured out how to manipulate the dreams of sleeping rats using audio cues that conjure a specific memory from the previous day.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OQ2nxD&via=Digg&text=Researchers Open The Door To 'Dream Engineering'

div.div: AT LEAST WE CAN'T HAVE DIMPLED LIKES

div.a: Can Facebook-Style Elections Produce Candidates We Actually 'Like?'

div.div: A number of experts contend that in spite of some real roadblocks, virtual parties are likely to gain greater traction in the coming decade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q24tQ7&via=Digg&text=Can Facebook-Style Elections Produce Candidates We Actually 'Like?'

div.div: SPACE

div.a: Is This NASA's Space Shuttle Substitute?

div.div: Now that the U.S. space shuttle program has ended, NASA is turning to the private sector for the next generation of reusable manned spacecraft.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OWf6lJ&via=Digg&text=Is This NASA's Space Shuttle Substitute?

div.div: FOR YOUR OWN PERSONAL HANGOVER
You are a special snowflake. There is no other person like you. And now, you have your very own personalized bottle of booze to match.

li.div: Absolut voda thinks you're one in a million. Well, one in 4 million. adweek.com/news/advertisin... #AdOfTheDay

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q395Sa&via=Digg&text=Absolut Introduces Personalized Bottles

div.div: ALL YOUR PRIZE ARE BELONG TO HIM

div.a: How One Man Beats 'Rigged' Carnival Games All The Time

div.div: Peter Drakos is so good at carnival games, that the entire industry has put limits on the amount of prizes you can win just because of him.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R8J0zD&via=Digg&text=How One Man Beats 'Rigged' Carnival Games All The Time

div.div: DIGITAL MUSIC

div.a: How Much Does An Artist Make From A Single Stream Of A Song On iTunes Match And Spotify?

div.div: Streaming music is a great experience for consumers, but how lucrative is it for the users on the other end of the deal, the artists?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TbvbGT&via=Digg&text=How Much Does An Artist Make From A Single Stream Of A Song On iTunes Match And Spotify?

div.div: SO TRUE

div.a: What Your Hotel Swimming Pool Is Really Like

div.div: If you were at a hotel swimming pool over Labor Day, it probably looked just like this.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OVxMSJ&via=Digg&text=What Your Hotel Swimming Pool Is Really Like

div.div: THINGS YOU DON'T WANT IN YOUR iTUNES LIBRARY

div.a: Mass Murderer Charles Manson Releases New Album

div.div: A vinyl album with a â€œraw countryâ€ sound and spoken-word poetry has been flying off the shelves at a Hollywood, Calif., boutique, never mind that the artist is convicted mass murderer Charles Manson.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RCSCqC&via=Digg&text=Mass Murderer Charles Manson Releases New Album

div.div: TOP O' THE MORNIN' TO YOU

div.a: The Psychological Syndrome That Gives You A Foreign Accent

div.div: Foreign Accent Syndrome (FAS) is one of those rare psychological disorders whose name literally describes the disease. People with FAS suddenly start speaking with foreign accents. Why? And how do doctors treat such a syndrome, besides giggling hysterically behind their hands?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OgJOTW&via=Digg&text=The Psychological Syndrome That Gives You A Foreign Accent

div.div: DRUGS

div.a: When Heroin Was A Drug You Gave Your Children

div.div: The scientists who invented heroin didnâ€™t mean to invent a highly addictive drug: in fact, they invented it by mistake. And the story of that mistake is one of the strangest in the history of drug discovery.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ON4rGv&via=Digg&text=When Heroin Was A Drug You Gave Your Children

div.div: iPHONE?

div.a: Apple Announces Special Event For September 12th

div.div: Apple on Tuesday sent out invites for an upcoming event happening in San Francisco on September 12, 2012. It is widely expected that the company will announce the next generation iPhone at the event.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OV4pQp&via=Digg&text=Apple Announces Special Event For September 12th

div.div: VITAL ADORABLENESS

div.a: Hug A Teddy, Check Your Pulse

div.div: HugBot is a large robot that puts the squeeze on you for about five seconds to measure your pulse.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Q25aDx&via=Digg&text=Hug A Teddy, Check Your Pulse

div.div: NO FRIENDLY PORTS FOR PIRATES

div.a: Cambodian Authorities Confirm Deportation Of Pirate Bay Founder

div.div: Following his arrest last week, it has now been confirmed that Gottfrid Svartholm will be deported from Cambodia.
